alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:44PM EDT until July 30 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/. * At 644 PM EDT/544 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Graceville to near Marianna to 12 miles northwest of Chattahoochee, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Marianna, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Campbellton, Bascom, Richter Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Blue Spring, Lovedale, Dellwood, Hornsville, Jacobs, Bahoma, Ellaville, Buena Vista, Marianna Municipal A/P and Jacob City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
